00087 #ifdef G2DLL
00088 #ifdef MAKEDLL

00091 #else

00093 #define G2L __declspec( dllimport)
00094 #endif
00095 #else 
00096 /* Use static win32 */
00097 #define G2L
00098 #endif
00099 #else
00100 /* Use non-win32 */
00101 #define G2L
